summary: Provides a post‑parse normalization of the abstract syntax tree, ensuring that every code block is represented as a statement list, wrapping solitary statements and discarding redundant pass nodes to create a uniform structure for later processing.
business_intent: Simplify and stabilize downstream code analysis and transformation stages by delivering a consistent, easy‑to‑traverse tree representation, reducing special‑case handling and improving maintainability of compiler or refactoring tools.
